triples.name: Social media
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes information spreading dynamics on social media platforms as its primary domain of study.

triples.name: Social network
triples.relevance: The paper examines the highly clustered nature of social networks and their role in information spreading.

triples.name: WeChat
triples.relevance: WeChat is one of the three major social media platforms used as a primary data source in this study.

triples.name: Weibo
triples.relevance: Sina Weibo is one of the three major social media platforms from which large-scale spreading data was collected.

triples.name: Twitter
triples.relevance: Twitter is one of the three major social media platforms providing data for analyzing information spreading dynamics.

triples.name: Diffusion of innovations
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes information spreading as a diffusion process on social networks with specific dynamics and mechanisms.

triples.name: Reinforcement
triples.relevance: The paper proposes social reinforcement as a key mechanism driving information spreading dynamics on social networks.
